title: Shades of Night
description: A vampire who has sworn to keep humans safe. A woman who holds a secret. A conspiracy no one is aware of. Nothing to lose but their world. Krystoff has sworn to bring the vampire renegades to justice, no matter the cost. That is until he meets Alexandria and he begins to question what he knows. Soon, Alexandra and Krystoff begin to uncover the plot the renegades have put into place and the consequences it will bring. Together they must unravel the clues of the past to stop the renegades before it is too late. If they donâ€™t hurry, all of mankind could be lost.
author: R.G. Porter
